review.title: “Nice place which fosters on your core strengths !”
review.pros: Pros – You have the freedom of expression and taking and improvising decisions. If you feel you want to work and create intrinsic value in the existing ecosystem this is the right place.
review.cons: Cons – Because of the structure and working environment - it requires shouldering of responsibility and commitments.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
